1109674869241708544.text:
At what point in the Core EIP process does contentious review happen? https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/at-what-point-in-the-core-eip-process-does-contentious-review-happen/2974 …

I would appreciate long form answers in the #EthMagicians forum.

1102745266090926080.text:
I wrote up a rough transcript of the Eth 2.0 Q+A from Paris today, facilitated by the @EthMagicians / @MPtherealMVP / @lrettig .

The Ethereum ecosystem moves fast; learn a bit on the beacon chain, spec evolution, VDFs, implemententers vs researchers, etchttps://medium.com/ethereum-magicians/q-a-on-eth-2-0-ab1d5d3ac133 …

1102701521559539713.text:

1102497016763039746.text: Very excited to join today's @EthMagicians #CouncilOfParis pic.twitter.com/4P7FasKJX1

1102501199331377154.text: The @EthMagicians #CouncilOfParis kicks off at the beautiful Conservatoire national des arts et métiers in Paris. Can't believe it's been a full year for the magicians! Looking forward to a full day of discussing how the Ethereum sausage is madepic.twitter.com/xsGyn4Ld8x – at Musée des Arts et Métiers

1102461953232924673.text:
I mediated the first @EthMagicians meetup, and I like to think I was a fairly large participant in the second one.

I wasn't able to make it to subsequent ones, and I haven't heard any indication that my presence was missed.

This is how it should work. Nobody should be crucial.

1102343015199313921.text: The @EthMagicians #CouncilOfParis 2.0 kicks off tomorrow, and we're doing a session on #ETH2. If you're working on ETH2 and you're in Paris, please join! My new @EthMagicians rule of thumb: 

“We should” is cheap and common, but “I am doing” is valuable / rare.

1047132156034715648.text: As I said before: @EthMagicians are not only some dudes coding in a room and talking Ethereum fundamentals. We’re a community trying to find solutions. 1041354873973944320.text: Oh hai I am back - volunteering to fire up @EthMagicians  council of prague ftw, EIP activism to the moon. You too should collaborate, its really fun. (Also its full of ethberliners - the best people out there)
